name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Sword of Lightning
description: A powerful sword infused with lightning energy.
looks: The sword has a blade crackling with electricity and a hilt made of pure silver.

name: Mystic Wand
description: A magical wand that emanates a mysterious energy
looks: The wand is made of polished wood and adorned with intricate carvings. It glows faintly with a soft blue light.

special_effects.mana_leech: Drains 2 mana from the target with each successful hit

name: Sword of the Thunderstorm
description: A mythical sword that harnesses the power of lightning.
looks: The Sword of the Thunderstorm has a long, silver blade with intricate engravings. The hilt is made of black leather, adorned with small lightning bolts.

special_effects.Thunderbolt Strike: 25% chance to deal additional lightning damage upon successful hit

name: Sword of the Elements
description: A powerful sword empowered by the elements.
looks: The sword has a sleek design with a blade that shimmers with different elemental colors.

special_weapon_skills.elemental_mastery: Increases the damage of elemental spells by 25%.

special_effects.elemental_fury: 20% chance to deal double damage with elemental attacks.

name: Crossbow
description: A powerful ranged weapon that uses a mechanism to shoot arrows with high accuracy and force
looks: The crossbow is made of a sturdy wooden frame with intricate carvings. It has a metallic limb and a strong string attached to it. The front end of the crossbow features a metal rail for loading and aiming the arrows.

name: Bow of Frost
description: A magical bow that shoots icy arrows.
looks: The bow is made of polished wood with intricate ice crystals embedded in the limbs. The string is made of woven ice fibers.

special_effects.freeze: Arrows have a chance to freeze the target, slowing them down.

name: Ancient Bow
description: A powerful bow crafted by ancient elven craftsmen.
looks: The bow is made of shimmering silver wood, adorned with intricate engravings of elven symbols. It is adorned with a string made of golden thread.

special_effects.critical_strike: Allows for a higher chance of landing critical hits.

name: Mace
description: A heavy blunt weapon with a spiked head.
looks: The mace is made of iron and has a wooden handle. The head of the mace is spiked, designed to crush bones and armor upon impact.

name: Iron Mace
description: A sturdy iron mace with a spiked head, designed for dealing heavy blunt damage.
looks: The iron mace has a long handle made of solid iron, with a spiked head at the end. It has a rough texture and weighs about 2 kg.

special_effects.stun: Has a chance to stun the enemy for 1 second upon successful hit.

name: Axe
description: A sharp and heavy axe that can be used for chopping wood or enemies.
looks: The axe has a long wooden handle with a sharp metal blade at the end. It has a leather strap at the end of the handle for better grip.

name: Steel Mace
description: A sturdy mace made of steel.
looks: The steel mace has a long handle with a round metal head. It is well-crafted and has a polished finish.

name: Warhammer
description: A heavy two-handed hammer used by warriors in battle.
looks: The warhammer is made of solid steel and has a long handle for powerful swings.

special_weapon_skills.hammer_mastery: Increases critical hit chance with warhammers.

special_effects.stunning_hit: Has a chance to stun the target on successful hit.

name: Mighty Warhammer
description: A large and heavy warhammer with a steel head and a sturdy wooden handle. It is designed for crushing blows and can deal devastating damage.
looks: The warhammer has a thick steel head with intricately carved patterns. The handle is made of polished dark oak and has a comfortable grip.

special_effects.crushing_blow: Has a chance to stun the target on hit.

name: Iron Dagger
description: A small, sharp dagger made of iron.
looks: The dagger has a thin blade with a sharp point, perfect for stabbing.

name: Fire Staff
description: A powerful staff imbued with the element of fire.
looks: The staff is made of solid oak and has intricate carvings of flames along its length. The top of the staff is adorned with a large ruby that glows with a fiery red light.

special_effects.burning_touch: Attacks have a chance to ignite the target, causing additional fire damage over time.

name: Battle Axe
description: A large and heavy two-handed axe with a long handle and a sharp blade.
looks: The battle axe has a wooden handle with leather wrappings for grip. The blade is made of steel and is quite sharp.

special_effects.heavy_swing: Allows for a powerful overhead swing that deals additional damage.
